ParticipationFee.title: Cuota/Cargos de participación
ParticipationFee.description: Una tarifa que aplica a los ofertantes que quieren participar en el proceso de licitaciones. Las tarifas pueden aplicar para acceder los documentos de oferta, para enviar las ofertas o puede haber una cuota que debe ser pagada por el ofertante ganador.

id.title: ID de tarifa
id.description: The locally unique identifier for the fee.

value.title: Valor
value.description: The monetary value of the fee.

relativeValue.title: Relative value
relativeValue.description: The value of the fee, as a proportion of a monetary value.

description.title: Descripción
description.description: Additional information about the fee, for example: the specific cases in which the fee is applicable (e.g. hard copies of documents only), the way in which the fee is levied, or the exact nature of the fee.

methodOfPayment.title: Payment methods
methodOfPayment.description: The accepted ways to pay the fee.

paymentAddress.title: Payment address
paymentAddress.description: The physical address to which to submit non-electronic payments.

payee.title: Payee
payee.description: The organization that receives the fee.

participationFees.title: Cuotas de participación
participationFees.description: Cualquier tarifa aplicable a los ofertantes que quieren participar en el proceso de licitaciones. Las tarifas pueden aplicar para acceder los documentos de oferta, para enviar las ofertas o puede haber una cuota que debe ser pagada por el ofertante ganador.

RelativeValue.title: Relative value
RelativeValue.description: The value of the participation fee, as a proportion of a monetary value.

proportion.title: Proportion
proportion.description: The proportion of the monetary value, expressed as a decimal between 0 and 1.

monetaryValue.title: Monetary value
monetaryValue.description: The name of the monetary value.
